p: These ambitious targets are challenged by the logistics of establishing programs that can achieve such coverage targets, more so in low‐ and middle‐income countries (LMICs). The cost for testing, for example, remains a challenge despite the amendment of the screening algorithm from a three‐ to two‐step approach. 24, 25 The latter consists of a single antibody detection test while discontinuing further confirmatory testing, followed by RNA testing to detect chronic infection. 24, 25
